name: Flower of Paradise Lost
title: Withered Dreamscape: Flower of Paradise Lost
desc: "But 'eternity' is ultimately a lie. Intoxication and love could only grind memories down to broken dreams."
in_play_description:
After an opponent takes DMG: If this DMG is Dendro DMG DMG or triggers Dendro-Related Reactions, Gain 1 Crowning Crystal. (Max 5 stacks.)
When the Action Phase begins or when your character triggers an Elemental Reaction: If your Crowning Crystal count is 5, create 1 Omni Element and draw 1 card. (Twice per Round)

skills.desc:
After an opponent takes DMG: If this DMG is Dendro DMG DMG or triggers Dendro-Related Reactions, Gain 1 Crowning Crystal. (Max 5 stacks.)
When the Action Phase begins or when your character triggers an Elemental Reaction: If your Crowning Crystal count is 5, create 1 Omni Element and draw 1 card. (Twice per Round)
(A character can equip a maximum of 1 Artifact)
